name: AntiPyro
description:
AntiPyro was developed during GameJam+ 2020

Your objective is to rescue two capyvaras wich are locked behind fire, enemies and puzzles, and bring them to their family.

You will need to extinguish fire and enemies, fly, push objects and freeze water using your extinguisher.

Controls:

Basic movement: WASD or Left Stick

Camera: mouse movement or Right Stick

Jump: Space or Gamepad North Button (Triangle on DualShock and Y on Xbox controller)

You can hold jump button to fly, consuming your extinguisher fuel.

Using your extinguisher: Hold Left Mouse Button or Gamepad South Button (X on Duashock and A on Xbox controller) and aim at anything to use your extinguisher, consuming its fuel.

Your extinguisher fuel is also your health, so manage it carefully. To recharge it, just stay still for a brief moment.
